showerReviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, the campground wasn’t very well maintained during our visit. Only one shower and one toilet were in working condition but not clean. The check-in process was inconvenient, with no staff present at the campground itself. Inste …

… . Park your RV and go out. You don't hang out here. There is a covered playground, 2 bathroom/shower buildings, and a larger building that probably has laundry, but it wasn't open. One of the bathroom/shower buildings wasn't open either. …
… There was only 1 working shower for women (the other building was completely closed). The toilets were nasty.

Had everything you need, sewer, water, power hooked ups, dog park, shower, toilet, and an easy walk to the strip-about 40 minutes to Caesars Palace.
Nice and basic but great location and not very noisy.

… closed at 7 pm. Ok then we let our kids play on the playground fine. Well they wanted to use the restrooms oh wait only 1 of 3 shower restrooms are in working order. Ok ok well we can do laundry haul all our bags to do laundry…guess what …

… $75 per night for a place for a Large RV.  The territory is spacious.  There is a Dump Station, electricity and fresh water.  There is also a toilet and shower on site.  Went here at night.  It is necessary to reserve a place in advance.

We stayed here for a few days. As long as your rig has a shower and laundry, this place is perfect! It’s got 20, 30, and 50 amp hook ups. This place is safe, quiet, clean (although run down). It’s just about an 8 minute walk to the strip. …

RV park is old, sad, depressing. The pool area doesn't have bathrooms and shower is blocked off. No wifi, no shade. Would be great to have shade trees artificial vegas style would be fine. It's understandable there are no actual trees but …
This place is just an expensive parking lot. With way too many speed bumps! The water is so hot that even using only cold it is almost too hot to shower in your rig. …

Weather was fantastic, sunny and warm.Good location, spots level,lots of water pressure, hot showers. All the workers in the park and in Circus Circus were extremely helpful and friendly. This park needs lots of maintenance. The laundry was …

The facility was very decent, clean with a pool and a clean laundry room. In general, everything was well kept and maintained. It was fairly priced. …
I've enjoyed this RV Park, but it needs more security, specially in the common areas like the mens shower. There seems to be suspicious activity (men having intercourse) in the shower stalls.
This RV/ motorhome park is great for permanent or short term. Staff kind & friendly, pool recently renovated and open, shower, laundry and game room. Many spaces are shaded. Pet areas.
Good place for long term stays. Pool is very clean. If your over 55 the 55 and uo section is wonderful.
Very clean park with security. From the paper I received at check in, they run a tight ship which we appreciated.  Would stay there again

showerReviews.reviewText: No private showers and the showers they do have only have cold water with the exception of 2. One is moderately warm. The other is hot but doesn't stay on for more than 5 seconds before you need to hit the button again and there's no shower …

… I would also like to note it is 2023, there is absolutely no need for an old WW2 style shower room. I understand it is 18 + in the men’s lock room, but every YMCA I have been too outside Vegas has stalls for privacy, store your bar of soap …

… been to. Clean with lots of amenities and friendly staff. Has even steam room, sauna, and a rock climbing wall. Couldn’t figure out how to get warm water from the shower but eh. It’s in the middle of the desert I can handle a cold shower

… on select members. Soon I wont have to deal with the discrimination I experience when I'm here and will go to the other locations. The only good thing is that this one provides both big and small towels which is good if you want to shower.

Facility in general is nice, but the showers are a slap in the face. Luke warm at best and if you don't use the handicap stall, you have a timed push button faucet with a sharp, stinging water spray. Kind of felt like an army shower. I …

I was told in the hospital that the Y gave people free showers.  I became homeless about a month ago, and I see the way people treat others when they are down.  So I went and prepared to pay oh, I went to the desk watch the lady looked at …

locations.title: Bill and Lillie Heinrich YMCA
locations.street: Meadows Ln Mon "Has even steam room
locations.content: Bill and Lillie Heinrich YMCA may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: No private showers and the showers they do have only have cold water with the exception of 2. One is moderately warm. The other is hot but doesn't stay on for more than 5 seconds before you need to hit the button again and there's no shower …

… I would also like to note it is 2023, there is absolutely no need for an old WW2 style shower room. I understand it is 18 + in the men’s lock room, but every YMCA I have been too outside Vegas has stalls for privacy, store your bar of soap …

… been to. Clean with lots of amenities and friendly staff. Has even steam room, sauna, and a rock climbing wall. Couldn’t figure out how to get warm water from the shower but eh. It’s in the middle of the desert I can handle a cold shower

… on select members. Soon I wont have to deal with the discrimination I experience when I'm here and will go to the other locations. The only good thing is that this one provides both big and small towels which is good if you want to shower.
